title: Plugging in X and Y
text: We must plug in $$x=0$$ and $$y=-4$$. Doing this, we get $$-4=0-4$$
speech: We must plug in  x is equal to 0  and  y, is equal to, negative 4 . Doing this, we get  negative 4 is equal to 0 minus 4

title: Determining Equality
text: $$-4=0-4$$ can be simplified to $$-4=-4$$, which is a true statement. Thus, the point lies on the line.
speech: minus 4 is equal to, 0 minus 4  can be simplified to  negative 4 is equal to negative 4 , which is a true statement. Thus, the point lies on the line.
